articles.content: We've been hearing reports that Apple has a new entry-level iPad coming, after the iPad 10.2 launched earlier this year. This 'iPad 10.5', as it's tentatively being called after its supposed size, co… [+2685 chars]

articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077 appearance: Whether you can change your appearance later explained - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Whether you can change your appearance later in Cyberpunk 2077 explained.
articles.content:
Your appearance in Cyberpunk 2077 is one of the first things you set in the game - alongside your life path and core attributes.
The game opens with a character creator, allowing you to set V's skin… [+2758 chars]
